name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 19, in Guangzhou, Guangdong, residents of Shaxi Village gathered to protest against the demolition of their old house, during which some residents were handcuffed and taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 19, many places announced that they would limit the speed of food delivery riders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: OPPO ColorOS has clearly installed a mobile phone name online review mechanism in the system update, which is a matter that must be agreed to.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
With the Paris Olympics approaching, why are people online obsessed with the idea that "gold medals are useless"?
Netizens said: Because food safety, education, employment, medical care, and elderly care are all more important than gold medals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 19, Shangluo, Shaanxi. According to Chinese official media reports, a sudden torrential rain and flash floods in Zhashui County caused the collapse of a highway bridge. As of 10:00 on the 20th, 5 vehicles had been found and 11 people had been killed. Preliminary verification showed that nearly 20 vehicles and more than 30 people were still missing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today is the third anniversary of the July 20 flood in Zhengzhou
On July 20, 2021, many places in Henan suffered from rare heavy rains and floods. According to official statistics, 398 people died or went missing in Henan, including 380 in Zhengzhou. Among them, the flooding accident on Metro Line 5, which killed 14 people, and the flooding accident in the Jingguang North Road Tunnel, which killed 6 people, were the most well-known.
Afterwards, the State Council authorized the investigation team to disclose that the Henan local government concealed 139 deaths and missing persons.
Xu Liyi, then secretary of the Zhengzhou Municipal Party Committee of the Communist Party of China, was dismissed, and dozens of officials including the mayor and deputy mayor of Zhengzhou were also held accountable for this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Water conditions in Kaifeng, Henan on July 20.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of July 20, a flash flood disaster occurred in Xinhua Village, Hanyuan County, Ya'an, Sichuan, and communications, roads, and bridges were interrupted. According to the local emergency department, after preliminary investigation, more than 30 people were missing and more than 40 houses were damaged.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 19, Tianjin. Netizens posted a video saying that a female tour guide lectured tourists, saying "spending money is God, not spending money is shit." Afterwards, the tour guide apologized to the tourists, saying that she had a brother who was paralyzed by gout at home and that she was anxious to make money.
Tianjin Tourism: The tour guide involved, Deng, had his tour guide license revoked last year and was an unlicensed tour guide. It is planned to impose a maximum fine of 30,000 yuan on him and confiscate his illegal gains.
